name: include
description:
Comma separated string of the relationship names you want to include the data of.
The relationships that can be included are:
  • `colli`
  • `consolidation_shipment`
  • `contract`
  • `contract.carrier`
  • `files`
  • `hook_logs`
  • `liability_coverage`
  • `service`
  • `service.carrier`
  • `service_options`
  • `shipment_status`
  • `shipment_status.status`
  • `shop`
  • `shop.organization`
  • `shipment_surcharges`
  • `manifest`
